scenario.name: registration
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field0]@guest SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=a[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "guest" <sip:[field0]@guest>;tag=[call_number] To: "guest" <sip:[field0]@guest> Call-ID: reg///[call_id] CSeq: 7 REGISTER Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp
